author: mbluj
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds VVLoose working points (WPs) of two species of the MVA2017v2 TauID which were forgotten in #26541; it is backport of #26824.

#### PR validation:
Matrix tests are running, but any surprise is expected as content of the PR is identical to #26824 which was tested with very same conditions.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
It is backport of #26824 to 10_6_X for UL.
title: Followup of switch to TauId MVA2017v2 for UL
